summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: PARWIN Infrared Flat Iron 1 1/4 Inch Digital Hair Straightener Iron with Ceramic Tourmaline Plate Temperature Control Hair Iron Christmas Gift Black
Review Date: 2019/01/14
Store: PARWIN
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'PARWIN', 'Hair Type': 'Coarse, Wavy, Frizzy, Curly, Thick, Thin', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Max Temperature Setting': '232.2 Degrees Celsius', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '13.94 x 3.82 x 1.93 inches; 1.3 Pounds', 'UPC': '605826620649', 'Manufacturer': 'Parwin'}
Review Text: I like the color and the size and the auto shut off is a major plus. But what I disliked about this flat iron is that the on/off switch in inside. They are push button too and not just a click/slide. Thought this was strange. While it's no unusual to have the switches inside, I found them more difficult to access on this iron. It's not uncommon to have the on/off on the outside and the heat control on the inside. I like the thinness of it though and it heats up fast enough. No issues there. It does its job. It just didn't hit my favorite flat iron list.
Review Title: Great Color
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 2 in 1 Hair Straightener and Curler Travel Curling Flat Iron Wand Crimper, Dual Voltage 110V-240V Ceramic Tourmaline 1 1/4 inch Portable
Review Date: 2019/02/14
Store: Madenia
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Madenia', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Size': '14 Inch (Pack of 1)', 'Item Weight': '0.9 Pounds', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '15.7 x 3.3 x 2.4 inches; 14.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '781573208030'}
Review Text: The size of this is great for me to do big fold unders or uppers. I have more of a pixie cut. It was nice and hot within a minute or so.  It has automatic shutoff, a must IMO, and you can adjust the temperature easily with a wee switch. You merely push a button on the side--one to use the curler, the other one to use the flat iron. It comes with a travel bag/pouch. I think it's a great deal for the price. I like that I only have to plug ONE appliance in to do my hair instead of plugging in both a curler and straightener.
Review Title: Curls very well
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: FAELBATY 2 Pack Shower Caps for Women Waterproof and Reusable Elastic Printed Shower Cap Beauty Salon Spa Shower Caps (leopard)
Review Date: 2020/11/23
Store: FAELBATY
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'FAELBATY', 'Material': 'Ethylene Vinyl Acetate (EVA)', 'Pattern': 'Leopard', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Number of Pieces': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '8.9 x 6.65 x 1.06 inches; 1.41 Ounces'}
Review Text: It works. It's a shower cap. Caps, actually.  You get two in this. And I like them fine but they're kinda flimsy compared to other show caps I've used. My hair didn't get wet, but I don't see these last months. I also would not pay ten dollars for them. However, with the holiday season approaching, I believe they'd make great stocking stuffers. A bonus: they don't stink.
Review Title: Kinda Cheap
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: KISSIO Matte Liquid Lipstick,Long Lasting Waterproof Velvet Lip Gloss Set, Pigmented Lip Makeup Gift Sets for Girls and Women
Review Date: 2020/12/05
Store: KISSIO
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'KISSIO', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Coverage': 'Full', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.27 x 5.04 x 0.43 inches; 1.83 Ounces'}
Review Text: I love that it's a little box with four different shades of red. Pamper yourself, find a favorite color, or stick this in someone's stocking. It's a great gift. I used one color. LOVED it, color wise, but it dried on the innermost part of my lip and pretty much disappeared, leaving me with a line in the middle of my lips. I detest having to reapply my lipstick constantly and I do have lipsticks with much better moisture and staying power, so these are not a win for me.
Review Title: Dried my Lips
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual's purchasing behavior reveals a pragmatic approach to beauty products, with a focus on functionality and convenience. Consistent moderate ratings (3.0 - 4.3) indicate a balanced satisfaction, often tempered by usability concerns. Key themes include a preference for multi-functional products, as seen in the choice of a dual-purpose hair straightener/curler, underscoring a desire for efficiency.

Quality considerations are evident, particularly in hair tools; features like heat control and automatic shutoff are valued, while the accessibility of design elements (like switch placement) is critiqued. In beauty items such as lip products, effectiveness and comfort are essential; dissatisfaction arises from products that require frequent reapplication or lack moisture.

Price sensitivity emerges, with a noted reluctance to overpay for less durable or lower-quality items, particularly shower caps described as flimsy but workable. Overall, the individual's core preferences reflect a strong emphasis on practicality, usability, and durability, coupled with a cautious approach to spending on beauty and personal care items. This suggests a discerning consumer who prioritizes both value and performance in their purchases.

target_interaction.title: Not too streaky
target_interaction.text:
I am an equestrian, and like most equestrians, I am super tan on top (with lines!) and have very pale legs. I got this stuff to help me fix that. I found that to get the best instant results, three drops per leg were the best. but that's also when you may get some minor streaking, but nothing compared to other self tanners I've used. I also used this on my tan lines to fade them. it works, but it also fades fast. Plan to use it every day.

I like that you mix it with your own lotion, so you can control the scent.

Very good price. Can't beat that.
target_interaction.title_meta: Self Tanning Drops - Color Correcting Self Tan Drops for Gradual Glow, Vegan and Cruelty Free, 1.01 Fl Oz
features: ✔️Sun-Kissed Skin: Maintain that beautiful, tanned skin all year round with the PAULINRISE self-tanning drops! Our formula was specially designed to help you obtain that natural, sun-kissed skin that everyone will envy.

✔️Advanced Blend: This natural self-tanner blend carefully selected ingredients to even out skin tone and help you get a uniform tan. The formula is made with color-correcting actives, fruit extracts, hyaluronic acid, hibiscus flower extract and more.

✔️Safe Formula: Our self-tanner is made entirely with premium and tested ingredients that check the highest quality standards. This formula is 100% cruelty-free, vegan-friendly, and skin-friendly, as you can use it for both face and body.

✔️Natural Look: The PAULINRISE tanning bronzer drops have a medium color that ensures a natural appearance as if you have spent all day at the beach. Also, the formula has a long-lasting effect and a lightweight texture for easy and uniform application.

✔️Easy to Use: These professional tanning drops can be added to your favorite moisturizer, serum oil, butter, then mixed very well to ensure maximum uniformity. You can add 1-12 drops depending on the tone you prefer. Make sure to wash your hand after application.
